quote: The [@nytimes](https://twitter.com/nytimes) sent a letter to their subscribers apologizing for their BAD coverage of me. I wonder if it will change - doubt it?
quotePlain: The @nytimes sent a letter to their subscribers apologizing for their BAD coverage of me. I wonder if it will change - doubt it?
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote:
While the letter does note that the New York Times underestimated support for Trump, it does not say their coverage of him throughout the campaign was bad. In fact, the letter praises New York Times reporters’ work.
The note does not include any semblance of an apology.
